00047                 void ImportTracks(TrackingData *tracks) {
00048                         POSITION pos = tracks->data.GetStartPosition();
00049                         DataGridViewRowCollection ^rows = this->dataGridView1->Rows;
00050                         rows->Clear();
00051                         
00052                         while (pos) {
00053                                 int i; BodyPath *b;
00054                                 tracks->data.GetNextAssoc(pos, i, b);
00055                                 rows->Add();
00056                                 DataGridViewRow ^row = rows[rows->Count-1];
00057                                 row->Cells["ID"]->Value = String::Format("{0}", b->id);
00058                                 row->Cells["Start"]->Value = String::Format("{0}", b->startFrame);
00059                                 row->Cells["Stop"]->Value = String::Format("{0}", b->startFrame+b->GetCount()-1);
00060                                 row->Cells["Duration"]->Value = String::Format("{0}", b->GetCount());
00061                                 if (m_tracks->doc->m_MergeID == b->id) {
00062                                         row->HeaderCell->Value = "Merge";
00063                                         mergingWith->Text =  Convert::ToString(b->id);
00064                                         mergingWith->Cursor = Cursors::No;
00065                                 }
00066 
00067                         }
00068                         DataGridViewColumn ^sCol = dataGridView1->SortedColumn;
00069                         ListSortDirection sOrder = dataGridView1->SortOrder == SortOrder::Ascending ? ListSortDirection::Ascending : ListSortDirection::Descending;
00070                         if (sCol)
00071                                 dataGridView1->Sort(sCol, sOrder);
00072                 }
00073 
00074         protected:
00078                 ~Tracks()
00079                 {
00080                         if (components)
00081                         {
00082                                 delete components;
00083                         }
00084                 }

00359                 private: System::Void buttonRemoveSegment_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00360                         int startFrame = 0;
00361                         // prompt for stopframe number
00362                         CTextEntryDlg dlgTextEntry;
00363                         if (dlgTextEntry.Show(NULL, "Cut track head", "Cut trail before frame:") == IDOK) {
00364                                 CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00365                                 startFrame = _atoi64(strResult);
00366                         }       
00367                         else 
00368                                 return;
00369                         // terminate track at stopFrame
00370                         BodyPath *bp;
00371                         if (m_tracks->data.Lookup(Convert::ToInt32(dataGridView1->CurrentRow->Cells["ID"]->Value), bp)) {
00372                                 bp->CutHead(startFrame);
00373                                 dataGridView1->CurrentRow->Cells["Start"]->Value = startFrame;
00374                         }
00375                 }
00376 
00377                 private: System::Void buttonVisible_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00378                         int startFrame = 0, stopFrame = 0;
00379                         // prompt for stopframe number
00380                         CTextEntryDlg dlgTextEntry;
00381                         if (dlgTextEntry.Show(NULL, "Visible", "Make visible from:") == IDOK) {
00382                                 CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00383                                 startFrame = _atoi64(strResult);
00384                                 if (dlgTextEntry.Show(NULL, "Visible", "Make visible to:") == IDOK) {
00385                                         CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00386                                         stopFrame = _atoi64(strResult);
00387                                 }       
00388                                 else 
00389                                         return;
00390                         }
00391                         else
00392                                 return;
00393                         
00394                         BodyPath *bp;
00395                         if (m_tracks->data.Lookup(Convert::ToInt32(dataGridView1->CurrentRow->Cells["ID"]->Value), bp)) {
00396                                 for (int i=max(startFrame-bp->startFrame, 0); i < min(stopFrame-bp->startFrame, bp->GetUpperBound());i++)
00397                                         bp->GetAt(i).visible = true;
00398                         }
00399                 }
00400                 private: System::Void buttonInvisible_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00401                         int startFrame = 0, stopFrame = 0;
00402                         // prompt for stop frame number
00403                         CTextEntryDlg dlgTextEntry;
00404                         if (dlgTextEntry.Show(NULL, "InVisible", "Make invisible from:") == IDOK) {
00405                                 CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00406                                 startFrame = _atoi64(strResult);
00407                                 if (dlgTextEntry.Show(NULL, "InVisible", "Make invisible to:") == IDOK) {
00408                                         CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00409                                         stopFrame = _atoi64(strResult);
00410                                 }       
00411                                 else 
00412                                         return;
00413                         }
00414                         else
00415                                 return;
00416                         // terminate track at stopFrame
00417                         BodyPath *bp;
00418                         if (m_tracks->data.Lookup(Convert::ToInt32(dataGridView1->CurrentRow->Cells["ID"]->Value), bp)) {
00419                                 for (int i=max(startFrame-bp->startFrame, 0); i < min(stopFrame-bp->startFrame, bp->GetUpperBound());i++)
00420                                         bp->GetAt(i).visible = false;
00421                         }
00422                 }

00424                 private: System::Void SortCompare(Object^ sender, DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs^ e) {
00425                         e->SortResult = Convert::ToInt32(e->CellValue1).CompareTo(Convert::ToInt32(e->CellValue2));
00426                         e->Handled = true;
00427                 }

00429                 // Removes short junk tracks
00430                 private: System::Void buttonDeleteShort_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) { 
00431                         
00432                         // prompt for minFrames
00433                         CTextEntryDlg dlgTextEntry;
00434                         int minFrames = 0;
00435                         if (dlgTextEntry.Show(NULL, "Remove Short Tracks (Note: Only tracks ending before the current frame will be deleted!", "Remove all tracks shorter than (frames):") == IDOK) {
00436                                 CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00437                                 minFrames = _atoi64(strResult);
00438                         }
00439                         else
00440                                 return;
00441 
00442                         // Remove from data
00443                         POSITION pos = m_tracks->data.GetStartPosition();
00444                         while (pos) {
00445                                 int id; BodyPath *p;
00446                                 m_tracks->data.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, p);
00447                                 if (p->startFrame + p->GetCount() < (int)m_tracks->doc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber - 1 
00448                                         && p->GetCount() < minFrames)
00449                                                 m_tracks->data.RemoveKey(id);
00450                         }
00451                         // Reload the tracks window
00452                         ImportTracks(m_tracks);
00453                  }
00454 
00455                 private: System::Void buttonDisplaySegments_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00456                         BodyPath *bp;
00457                         if (m_tracks->data.Lookup(Convert::ToInt32(dataGridView1->CurrentRow->Cells["ID"]->Value), bp)) {
00458                                 String^ msg = String::Format("Visible segments for ID={0}:\n\n", bp->id);
00459                                 msg += bp->ListVisibleSegments();
00460                                 MessageBox::Show(msg);
00461                         }
00462 
00463                  }
00464                 private: System::Void buttonBridgeGaps_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00465                                 // prompt for minLength
00466                                 CTextEntryDlg dlgTextEntry;
00467                                 int maxLength = 0;
00468                                 if (dlgTextEntry.Show(NULL, "Bridge Invisibility Gaps", "Bridge all gaps shorter than (frames):") == IDOK) {
00469                                         CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00470                                         maxLength = _atoi64(strResult);
00471                                         
00472                                         // for all paths bridge gaps less than minLength
00473                                         POSITION pos = m_tracks->data.GetStartPosition();
00474                                         while (pos) {
00475                                                 int id; BodyPath *p;
00476                                                 m_tracks->data.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, p);
00477                                                 p->BridgeInvisibleGaps(maxLength);
00478                                         }
00479                                 }
00480                          }

00483                                 m_tracks->doc->UpdateAll();

00487                 private: System::Void buttonMerge_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00488                                 int id_master = Convert::ToInt32(dataGridView1->CurrentRow->Cells["ID"]->Value);
00489                                 for each (DataGridViewRow^ row in dataGridView1->SelectedRows) {
00490                                         int id_slave = Convert::ToInt32(row->Cells["ID"]->Value);
00491                                         m_tracks->MergeID(id_master, id_slave);
00492                                 }
00493                                 m_tracks->doc->UpdateAll();
00494                                 ImportTracks(m_tracks);
00495                 }

00507                 private: System::Void buttonDelete_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00508                         // if  no rows selected then delete current row
00509                         if (dataGridView1->SelectedRows->Count == 0)
00510                                 m_tracks->data.RemoveKey(Convert::ToInt32(dataGridView1->CurrentRow->Cells["ID"]->Value));
00511                         else
00512                                 for each (DataGridViewRow^ row in dataGridView1->SelectedRows) {
00513                                         m_tracks->data.RemoveKey(Convert::ToInt32(row->Cells["ID"]->Value));
00514                                         dataGridView1->Rows->Remove(row);
00515                                 }
00516                          m_tracks->doc->UpdateAll();
00517                  }
00518                 private: System::Void buttonTerminate_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00519                         if (dataGridView1->CurrentRow) {
00520                                  int stopFrame = 0;
00521                                  // prompt for stopframe number
00522                                  CTextEntryDlg dlgTextEntry;
00523                                  if (dlgTextEntry.Show(NULL, "Cut track tail", "Cut track after frame:") == IDOK) {
00524                                          CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00525                                          stopFrame = _atoi64(strResult);
00526                                  }      
00527                                  else 
00528                                          return;
00529                                  // terminate track at stopFrame
00530                                  BodyPath *bp;
00531                                  if (m_tracks->data.Lookup(Convert::ToInt32(dataGridView1->CurrentRow->Cells["ID"]->Value), bp)) {
00532                                          bp->CutTail(stopFrame);
00533                                          dataGridView1->CurrentRow->Cells["Stop"]->Value = stopFrame;
00534                                  }
00535                          }
00536                 }
00537 
00538                 protected: virtual void OnClosed(System::EventArgs^  e) override {
00539                          //m_tracks->doc->displayTrackInfo = false;
00540                          m_tracks->doc->OnViewTracks();
00541                          System::Windows::Forms::Form::OnClosed(e);
00542                 }

00544                 protected: virtual void OnActivated(System::EventArgs^  e) override {
00545                    mergingWith->Text =  "None";
00546                    mergingWith->Cursor = Cursors::Default;
00547                    ImportTracks(m_tracks);
00548                    System::Windows::Forms::Form::OnActivated(e);
00549                 }
00550 
00551                 private: System::Void DoubleClick(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {      
00552                                 if (dataGridView1->CurrentCell->OwningColumn->Name->Equals("id")) {
00553                                         m_tracks->EditInfoID(Convert::ToInt32(dataGridView1->CurrentRow->Cells["ID"]->Value));
00554                                         m_tracks->doc->UpdateAll();
00555                                         return;
00556                                 }
00557                                 if (dataGridView1->CurrentCell->OwningColumn->Name->Equals("start")) 
00558                                         m_tracks->doc->trackermodel.SetPosition(Convert::ToInt32(dataGridView1->CurrentRow->Cells["Start"]->Value));
00559                                 if (dataGridView1->CurrentCell->OwningColumn->Name->Equals("stop")) 
00560                                         m_tracks->doc->trackermodel.SetPosition(Convert::ToInt32(dataGridView1->CurrentRow->Cells["Stop"]->Value));
00561                                 m_tracks->doc->UpdateOverlayInfo();
00562                                 if (::IsWindow(theApp.m_pMainWnd->m_hWnd)) {
00563                                         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATENAVBAR);
00564                                         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATESTATUSBAR);
00565                                         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATEACTIVEVIEW);
00566                                 }
00567                 }
00568                 
00569                 private: System::Void Click(System::Object^ sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {    
00570                         if ( Control::ModifierKeys == Keys::Alt) {
00571                                 int newID = Convert::ToInt32(dataGridView1->CurrentRow->Cells["ID"]->Value);
00572                                 // if this ID is not aleady selected
00573                                 if (m_tracks->doc->m_MergeID != newID) {
00574                                         //find row
00575                                            //dataGridView1->CurrentRow->HeaderCell->Value = "";
00576                                         dataGridView1->CurrentRow->HeaderCell->Value = "M";
00577                                         m_tracks->doc->m_MergeID = newID;
00578                                         mergingWith->Text =  Convert::ToString(newID);
00579                                         mergingWith->Cursor = Cursors::No;
00580                                 }
00581                                 else {
00582                                         dataGridView1->CurrentRow->HeaderCell->Value = "";
00583                                         m_tracks->doc->m_MergeID = -1;
00584                                         mergingWith->Text =  "None";
00585                                         mergingWith->Cursor = Cursors::Default;
00586                                 }
00587                         }
00588                 }
00589 
00590                 private: System::Void mergingWith_LinkClicked(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs^  e) {
00591                          if (m_tracks->doc->m_MergeID != -1) {
00592                                  dataGridView1->CurrentRow->HeaderCell->Value = "";
00593                                  m_tracks->doc->m_MergeID = -1;
00594                                  mergingWith->Text =  "None";
00595                                  mergingWith->Cursor = Cursors::Default;
00596                          }
00597                 }
00598                 private: System::Void buttonAutoMerge_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) {
00599                         CTextEntryDlg dlgTextEntry;
00600                         CString strResult;
00601                         if (dlgTextEntry.Show(NULL, "Auto Merge tracks", "Maximum frame distance to merge: ") != IDOK)
00602                                 return;
00603                         strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00604                         int maxFrames = _atoi64(strResult);
00605                         if (dlgTextEntry.Show(NULL, "Auto Merge tracks", "Maximum floor distance to merge (cm): ") != IDOK)
00606                                 return;
00607                         strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00608                         double maxDist = _atoi64(strResult);
00609                         if (dlgTextEntry.Show(NULL, "Auto Merge tracks", "No other bodies within distance (cm): ") != IDOK)
00610                          return;
00611                         strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00612                         double maxOtherDist = _atoi64(strResult);
00613                         ShowProgressDialog("Auto-merging tracks", m_tracks->doc->m_TrackingData.data.GetCount());
00614                         m_tracks->AutoMerge(maxFrames, maxDist, maxOtherDist);
00615                         HideProgressDialog();
00616                          // Reload the tracks window
00617                         ImportTracks(m_tracks);
00618                         m_tracks->doc->UpdateAll();
00619                 }
00620 };
